Nov. 23, 2013 D Scottish Challenge Cup
Scottish Challenge Cup 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Scottish BBA Festival of Brass scottish-challenge-cup

Perth Concert Hall, Perth, Perth & Kinross, Scotland, UK Adj A: Leigh Baker Adj B: Simone Rebello Adj C: John Boax

Oct. 20, 2013, 9:27 p.m. Nov. 25, 2013, 11:17 p.m.
